title: Our 2023 resolutions - January top picks
author: Wheelhouse
description: To start the year off, we listed our New Year's resolutions as our January top picks.
introduction: To start the year off, we listed our New Year's resolutions as our January top picks. Let's see what we have here:

items.title: Fitness + more languages
items.description:
This year I have three goals in mind:

* Benching 225lbs in the gym
* Doing a 100km route on my bike
* Learn more languages for native application and use them.

These goals will hopefully be hit the end of the year!

items.title: Webshop
items.description: Starting a small webshop with my girlfriend, selling unique AI generated art in b&w, on high quality paper.

items.title: Triathlon

Marketing-wise, I would really love to hit 2000 followers on the Wheelhouse LinkedIn, so go ahead and follow our page while youâ€™re at it! ðŸ˜‰

items.title: Meditation
items.description: Last year my main goal was to gain more confidence, which was definitely a challenge, but I managed to do so anyway. So this year, I will learn to unwind and relax more by doing daily meditation exercises!

items.title: More creativity
items.description: The previous year I envisioned myself swimming more (or performing other sports). While that resolution is entirely resolved, this year, I want to focus on spending my free time more creatively by making live visuals, learning Blender, and picking painting/drawing back up, but Iâ€™ll see how far I get with the first two.
